code: import React from'react';import{X,Plus}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TagSection=_ref=>{let{config,onTagRemove,onTagAdd}=_ref;const{tags}=config;const getTagColorClass=color=>{const colorMap={blue:'tag-blue',purple:'tag-purple',gray:'tag-gray'};return colorMap[color]||'tag-gray';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white border-b",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2 flex-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 mr-2",children:"Tags"}),tags.map(tag=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`tag ${getTagColorClass(tag.color)}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:tag.label}),tag.removable&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onTagRemove(tag.id),className:"hover:bg-black hover:bg-opacity-10 rounded p-0.5","aria-label":`Remove ${tag.label} tag`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:12})})]},tag.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onTagAdd,className:"tag tag-gray hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors","aria-label":"Add new tag",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Plus,{size:12})})]})})})});};export default TagSection;
